name: The Vegan Spider Hunter Meat Factory
name_original: The Vegan Spider Hunter Meat Factory
description:
This game was created for #KENNEYJAM 2022.

It's inspired by the game "Vampire Survivors".

You can choose one of 4 Characters with different weapons. They Grow by level up and become stronger while consuming runes.

Controlls:

Keyboard: WASD and/or Arrow Keys - Movement

Gamepad: DPAD and/or Joystic - Movement
